title: Garage Apartment Furnished All Bills Paid
posting_body: Less than 1 miles from Downtown, 1 miles from U of H, and 10 miles from Texas Medical Center.
Walking distance to Metro bus and light rail.
Free washer and dryer shared with other tenants.
High speed internet and premium cable TV provided.
Covered parking, linens, kitchen utensils, dishes, microwave, stove, refrigerator, and TV provided.
$700/month if renting for less than 3 months.
Rental price is for one occupant only.
Owned, and lovingly maintained, by a retired firefighter and a retired registered nurse.
Rental price is reduced to $700 month if more than 1 months
